detail_description: Samudra Beach, situated in Kovalam along the Arabian Sea, is a top attraction in the area. Its serene ambiance and white sandy beaches make it an ideal destination for all types of travelers. The crystal blue waters, pristine sands, and palm trees create a picturesque setting that's just a short distance from Chennai Airport.
name: Samudra Beach
address: VP 1, GV Raja Rd, Kovalam, Kerala 695527, India

detail_description: Located in Kovalam, the Rock Cut Cave Shiva Temple is a must-visit for history and spirituality enthusiasts. Dating back to the 8th century, this temple is carved from rock and showcases intricately crafted sculptures and ancient architectural marvels. The serene ambiance and beautiful surroundings make it an ideal spot for a romantic stroll. The temple features a large natural well and a shrine that appears to be suspended in the sky due to its unexcavated nature.
name: Rock-Cut Cave Shiva Temple, Vizhinjam
address: Police Station, Vizhinjam, Kovalam, Kerala 695521, India

detail_description: Lighthouse Beach in Kovalam is a popular destination known for its stunning lighthouse that stands at 30 meters tall. Visitors can climb 140 stairs to reach the top and enjoy breathtaking views of the surrounding natural beauty. Despite being crowded, it remains one of the must-visit spots in Kovalam.
name: Light House Beach

detail_description: Hawa Beach, also known as Eve's Beach, is a serene and clean coastline along the Arabian Sea in Kovalam, Kerala. It is a popular destination for beach enthusiasts with its variety of seafood restaurants, gift shops, and clothing stores. The beach offers stunning views of the sea from the lighthouse and is an ideal spot to enjoy beautiful sunsets.
name: Hawa Beach
address: 9XPG+QQM, Light House Rd, Kovalam, Kerala 695527, India

detail_description: The Art Gallery in Samudra Beach is a charming space showcasing the talents of local artists. Visitors can enjoy a diverse collection of art including paintings, sculptures, and ceramics. It's a delightful spot to explore and appreciate the creativity of the area's artistic community.
name: Art Gallery In Samudra Beach
address: CX2F+VFQ, GV Raja Rd, opposite Hotel Uday Samudra, Kovalam, Kerala 695527, India

detail_description: Halcyon Castle, a majestic heritage hotel located in Kerala, India, is a stunning example of colonial architecture. The castle was originally built for the royal family of Travancore and has now been converted into a luxurious hotel. Set amidst lush greenery and overlooking the Arabian Sea, Halcyon Castle offers guests an opportunity to experience the grandeur of a bygone era. The interiors are adorned with exquisite period furniture and elegant decor, creating an atmosphere of old-world charm and opulence.
name: Halcyon Castle

excerpt: This simple, compact aquarium features tanks displaying a unique collection marine life.
detail_description: Sagarika Marine Research Aquarium, also known as Vizhinjam Marine Aquarium, is a compact yet fascinating destination showcasing a diverse collection of marine life. Situated on an 8-acre plot, this aquarium boasts over 100 species of tropical fish, including groupers, catfish, sharks, and stingrays. Visitors can witness captivating moon jellyfish and sea nettles in the jellyfish tank during feeding time.
name: Sagarika Marine Research Aquarium
address: Near Light House Road, Vizhinjam Harbour Road, Kovalam, Kerala 695521, India

detail_description: Kovalam Beach is home to the iconic Vizhinjam Lighthouse, a popular attraction that offers stunning panoramic views of the surrounding area. This 45-year-old lighthouse provides visitors with a breathtaking experience and is a must-visit when in the area. Additionally, Kovalam Beach's proximity to other attractions like Varkala Beach makes it an ideal destination for beach lovers looking to explore the beauty of Trivandrum.
name: Kovalam Beach

excerpt: Traditional red-&-white striped lighthouse, constructed in 1972, with an interior spiral staircase.
detail_description: Nestled near the picturesque Kovalam beach in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, the Vizhinjam Lighthouse is a striking red-and-white striped beacon that has been guiding sailors since its completion in 1972. Standing tall at 36 meters on Kurumkal Hill, this lighthouse not only serves as a vital navigational aid but also offers breathtaking panoramic views of the Arabian Sea and the surrounding lush landscapes.
name: Vizhinjam Light House
address: 9XMH+5V4, Light house Junction, Vizhinjam, near Kovalam, Kovalam, Kerala 695521, India

excerpt: Kovalam is a small coastal town in the southern Indian state of Kerala, south of Thiruvananthapuram. At the southern end of Lighthouse Beach is a striped lighthouse with a viewing platform. Palm-backed beaches also include Hawa Beach and Samudra Beach. Heading south, Vizhinjam Juma Masjid mosque overlooks the busy fishing harbor. Inland, Sagarika Marine Research Aquarium displays technology used in pearl production.
detail_description: Kovalam, a charming coastal town in Kerala, India, is known for its picturesque beaches and vibrant atmosphere. Lighthouse Beach, with its iconic striped lighthouse and panoramic views, is a popular spot for tourists. The town also boasts other beautiful beaches like Hawa Beach and Samudra Beach. Away from the shore, visitors can explore the Vizhinjam Juma Masjid mosque and the bustling fishing harbor.
name: Kovalam

detail_description: Grove Beach is a tranquil coastal destination offering a variety of activities to cater to different tastes. The sun-drenched shores create an ideal environment for relaxation, where visitors can lounge on soft sands, bask in the sun's rays, and revel in the calming ocean sounds. The clear waters are perfect for swimming and offer opportunities for snorkeling and kayaking. This small bay is sheltered by rocky formations, providing calm waters akin to a vast swimming pool with minimal waves.
name: Grove Beach

detail_description: The German Bakery in Kovalam is a popular hangout spot with a good ambiance. It's known for its fusion cuisine and is highly recommended by travelers visiting the area. The bakery offers a pleasant dining experience, making it one of the best places to eat in Kovalam. With its beach town location on the Arabian Sea, Kovalam attracts tourists looking for an enjoyable culinary experience.
name: the german bakery
address: 9XPH+7P5, Light House Beach Rd, Kovalam, Kerala 695527, India

excerpt: This sandy beach features unusual rock formations at its edge & large waves suitable for surfing.
detail_description: Samudra Beach is a stunning shoreline located in the southern part of Kerala. It is known for its unusual rock formations and large waves that make it perfect for surfing enthusiasts. This beach is often overshadowed by popular tourist spots, but those who appreciate serene and secluded places will love Samudra Beach. Visitors can enjoy impressive scenic views and have an afternoon picnic on this well-maintained coast.
name: Samudra Beach Park

detail_description: Kerala Arts & Crafts Village, located in the picturesque village of Vellar near Kovalam, spans 8.5 acres and showcases the diverse craft traditions of South Asia. The village is a collaborative space that aims to revive and nurture Kerala's rich craft culture, housing 100 skilled artisans and various facilities such as craft studios, an art gallery, and a restaurant.
name: Kerala Arts & Crafts Village

detail_description: Kovalam Juma Masjid is a small mosque located on the picturesque Ashoka Beach, the third famous beach in Kovalam. Situated diagonally opposite to the Ganapati Temple, it offers a serene ambiance for prayers. The mosque is currently undergoing renovation work and provides a peaceful setting for Juma qutba after a 30-minute speech. Visitors appreciate its cleanliness and proximity to the beach, making it an ideal location for prayer beside the Arabian Sea.
name: Kovalam Juma Masjid
address: 9XWF+M8J, Beach Rd, Kovalam, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala 695527, India

detail_description: Kovalam Surf Club, located in the coastal town of Kovalam, India, is a popular destination for surfing enthusiasts. The club benefits from the town's uninterrupted coastline and is also home to the Surfing Federation of India's surfing contest. Visitors interested in learning or experiencing surfing can visit this club. Additionally, nearby attractions include the Vizhinjam Marine Aquarium, which offers an engaging experience for children with its Image Pearl Technique observation.
name: Kovalam Surf Club
address: Light House Beach Rd, Kovalam, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala 695527, India

detail_description: Sanghamitra Art Gallery in Kovalam is a must-visit for art enthusiasts. It offers a rich display of local artists' works, including paintings, sculptures, and various art forms. The gallery provides an immersive experience into the vibrant art scene of Kerala, making it a great place to appreciate and support local talent.
name: Sanghamitra Art Gallery
address: 9XMJ+C35, Light House Rd, Kovalam Beach, Kovalam, Kerala 695521, India

detail_description: Kovalam Beach, located 16 km from the town, is a popular spot especially after 10 P.M. The beach is bustling with people enjoying the cool evening breeze and having a great time. Additionally, visitors can explore the famous 35-meter high lighthouse at Lighthouse Beach situated on Kurumkal Hillock.
name: Kovalam Beach

excerpt: Ancient Hindu temple where devotees pay homage to ancestors & after-death ceremonies are performed.
detail_description: The Thiruvallam Parasurama Swami Temple is a popular Hindu temple located in the town of Thiruvallam, near Thiruvananthapuram. The temple is dedicated to Lord Parasurama, the creator of Kerala, and is home to several important after-death ceremonies. The temple is also popular among devotees for its natural beauty and peaceful surroundings.
name: Parasurama Swami Temple, Thiruvallam

excerpt: Picturesque freshwater lake offering abundant flora & fauna, boat rides & walking trails.
detail_description: Vellayani Lake, also known as Vellayani Kayal, is a stunning freshwater lake located in Thiruvananthapuram District, Kerala. Spanning about 50 hectares, it offers picturesque views and is home to abundant flora and fauna. Visitors can enjoy boat rides on the tranquil waters and explore the surrounding walking trails. The lake holds historical significance as it was once used as a summer retreat by the Travancore royal family for entertaining guests.
name: Vellayani Lake

detail_description: Working at Bond Safari Kovalam is a pleasant experience, as they offer a wide range of courses. The management team and staff are always supportive and have a positive attitude towards helping whenever needed. This scuba tour agency provides an excellent opportunity to learn scuba diving, from novice to advanced levels, as well as offering a conducive environment for professionals to work, teach, and advance in their careers.
name: Bond Safari Scuba Diving
address: Suseela Tower VRP XIX/553-A, Beach Rd, Kovalam, Kerala 695527, India

excerpt: Vizhinjam is an area located in the city of Thiruvananthapuram, the capital city of the state of Kerala in India. which belongs to Thiruvananthapuram Corporation. It is located 16 km south west from the city centre and 17 km south of Trivandrum International Airport along NH66. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Vizhinjam, situated in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, is a unique village within the Neyyattinkara Taluk under the Thiruvananthapuram Corporation. The area is home to the ancient Vizhinjam temple, a Hindu religious site dating back to the 8th century and located approximately 20 km from Trivandrum's city center.
name: Vizhinjam

detail_description: Edakkallu Rock Garden is a beautiful place to visit, with impressive natural scenery and views of the ocean and the lighthouse nearby. However, some tourists abuse the cactus plants and rocks by writing their names on them, which is a violation of local laws. This park should be more popular as it offers great views for tourists without any interference from these individuals.
name: Edakkallu Rock Garden
Om Ayur Shanti Ayurvedic Panchakarma Center
address: roof top, near hotel beach Florra inn Sea sand tourist home, Light House Beach, Kovalam, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala 695527, India

excerpt: Sprawling mosque complex with traditional ornate architectural details & a popular yearly festival.
detail_description: Beemapally Masjid, located in Trivandrum, Kerala, is a sprawling mosque complex known for its traditional ornate architectural details and striking Islamic styles. Dedicated to the revered Muslim saint Beema Beevi, it is believed to have healing powers. The mosque features a white and green facade, domes, and minarets that stand out against the serene surroundings.
name: Beemapally Masjid
address: Valiyathura - Beemapally - Poonthura Rd, Muttathara, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala 695008, India

detail_description: Eve's Beach Rd, also known as the Paradise of the South, is part of the crescent-shaped Kovalam Beach in India. This popular destination consists of two sections: Lighthouse Beach and Eve's Beach. The area is renowned for its pristine sandy shores and iconic lighthouses that provide a unique backdrop for various activities. Tourists are drawn to this picturesque location to enjoy the clean and beautiful surroundings while engaging in a wide range of leisure pursuits.
name: Eve's Beach Rd

detail_description: Vizhinjam Harbour Rd offers stunning views of the expansive ocean, with Kovalam beach on one side and a hidden beach, a mosque, and the bustling Vizhinjam harbour on the other. The road leading to the lighthouse is narrow but accessible by car. The lighthouse itself is a sight to behold, particularly at night when its beacon illuminates the surroundings at regular intervals, creating a mesmerizing spectacle.
name: Vizhinjam Harbour Rd

excerpt: Dam on the Neyyar River with a reservoir, boating, picnic areas, a wildlife sanctuary & lion safari.
detail_description: The Neyyar Dam is a large structure built on the Neyyar River, featuring a reservoir, picnic areas, and a wildlife sanctuary that offers visitors an opportunity to take part in various types of boating activities on the water. Of these options, the wildlife boating experience stands out as it takes passengers through twists and turns to reach the "wildlife preservation centre," which is a nature retreat in itself that is definitely worth visiting.
name: Neyyar Dam Trivandrum
